articles.title: UK needs tighter COVID rules to avert new 'catastrophe', epidemiologist warns - Reuters India
articles.description: Britain's government needs to bring in tighter coronavirus lockdown rules to avert a fresh wave of deaths from a new strain of the disease, a leading epidemiologist and government advisor warned on Tuesday.
